quorum.translation[0].definitions[0].def: the smallest number of people who must be present at a meeting so that official decisions can be made
quorum.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: We need a quorum of seven.
quorum.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the smallest number of people who must be present at a meeting for official decisions to be made
quorum.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: Not enough members turned up to achieve a quorum.
